attributes.action: 4 years for accidents, point or cancelled policy to be declared.
attributes.additional_details: It is not fair as anyone can make a mistake but its seems that the insurances take too much advantage of this sending people to bankruptcy and other people to break the law.
attributes.background: Accidents and points should stay on your insurance just as long as the points stay on your licence: 4 years , as well as the cancelled, voided or refused insurance, 4 years.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what information to request before granting an insurance policy are a matter for individual insurers, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
